name: KitchenConversions
0:
”Alexa, open kitchen converter.”
”Alexa, ask kitchen converter to convert two cups to pints.”
”Alexa, ask kitchen converter how many pints are in 8 cups.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kitchen converter
des: Convert between milliliters, liters, ounces, cups, pints, quarts, gallons, teaspoons, and tablespoons. Works when converting from a whole number of the desired unit.
